summary: The content of the previously published piece did not meet CoinDesk's editorial standards.
title: Retraction: BAYC Founder Opinion Piece
content: Editor-in-Chief's note (Jan. 31, 2023, 23:54 UTC): The column by a first-time external contributor was based on inflammatory, unsubstantiated conspiracy theories and as such never should have been published. Accordingly, the content has been removed. We apologize for the editorial lapse.
